name: Infinity Defender
description:
Infinity Defender is a reaction game in which you have to change the player's direction to defend against enemies. For every enemy you get a point but the newly spawned enemies will be faster. The player has one life. Your objective is to reach a personal best high score. Classic mode only has blue enemies. Hard mode has blue and orange enemies but gives 1.5x points.

Controls

Change direction with : A / D or Left Arrow / Right Arrow

Confirm choices in menus by turning to the same direction

Close the game with : Backspace

Turn towards blue squares.

Turn away from orange squares.
